body:
Edafe Onerhime is a consultant on Data Science and Data Analysis who has over 20 years of experience answering difficult questions about open data. She has helped governments, charities and businesses make better decisions and build stronger relationships by understanding, using and sharing their data.
Caught amidst the intersection of technology, open data, art & music, shi Blank is a feral games developer who taught herself how to code. A fierce believer of assessible knowledge, shi mentors kids and parents regularly at code clubs and is currently creating a women-focused makerspace in the city they are based in.
